SELECT DISTINCT a.team team_name, a.tmcod team_code, a.ord1, a.ord2, a.cls ord3 FROM if_user.sysa01tb a, if_user.sysa02tb b WHERE a.app IN ('0', '2') AND length(a.tmcod) >= 8 AND B.TEAM = A.TEAM
AND a.team like '%' || #{team_name} || '%'
AND a.tmcod like '%' || #{team_code} || '%'
ORDER BY a.ord1, decode(a.ord1, '001', a.ord2, '002', a.ord2, a.team), a.cls

SELECT TEAM_CODE, TEAM_NAME, PLM_TEAM_NAME , OLD_TEAM_CODE, OLD_TEAM_NAME, USE_YN , CHANGE_TYPE, CHANGE_DATE FROM ( SELECT A.TEAM_CODE , A.TEAM_NAME , A.PLM_TEAM_NAME , A.OLD_TEAM_CODE , A.OLD_TEAM_NAME , A.USE_YN , A.CHANGE_TYPE , A.CHANGE_DATE , A.ORD1 , DECODE(A.ORD1, '001', A.ORD2, '002', A.ORD2, A.TEAM_CODE) AS ORD2 , A.ORD3 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.TEAM_NAME ORDER BY A.USE_YN DESC) AS ROWNUM_BY_TEAM FROM TEAM_HISTORY A WHERE 1 = 1
AND TEAM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{team_name} || '%'
AND TEAM_CODE LIKE '%' || #{team_code} || '%'
) WHERE ROWNUM_BY_TEAM = 1 ORDER BY ORD1, ORD2, ORD3

SELECT EMPNO AS USER_ID , TRIM(HNAME) AS USER_NAME , TMCOD AS TEAM_CODE , TEAM AS TEAM_NAME , JWCOD AS ROLE_ID , JIKWI AS ROLE_NAME , EMAIL2 FROM if_user.SYSA02TB WHERE EMPNO IS NOT NULL AND EMAIL2 IS NOT NULL
AND USE = 'Y'
AND USE in ( 'X', 'Y')
AND EMPNO like '%' || #{user_id} || '%'
AND HNAME like '%' || #{user_name} || '%'
AND TMCOD like '%' || #{team_code} || '%'
AND TEAM like '%' || #{team_name} || '%'
ORDER BY USER_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT VNET_TEAM.TEAM_CODE AS TEAM_CODE FROM ( SELECT VNET_TEAM.TMCOD AS TEAM_CODE, UPPER(REPLACE(VNET_TEAM.TEAM_E, '.', '')) AS TEAM_E_NAME, VNET_TEAM.TEAM AS TEAM_NAME, VNET_TEAM.DOCNO1 AS STATE, VNET_USER.EMPNO AS LEADER_EMP_NO, VNET_USER.HNAME AS LEADER_K_NAME, UPPER(REPLACE(VNET_USER.ENAME, ',', '')) AS LEADER_E_NAME FROM if_user.SYSA02TB VNET_USER, if_user.SYSA01TB VNET_TEAM WHERE VNET_TEAM.TEAM=VNET_USER.TEAM AND VNET_TEAM.APP IN ('0', '2') AND VNET_USER.JIKCK='팀장' AND VNET_USER.USE <> 'X' ) VNET_TEAM, ( SELECT PGROUP.PDESCRIPTION AS TEAM_CODE, PPOM_GROUP.PNAME AS TEAM_E_NAME, PPOM_USER.PUSER_ID as LEADER_EMP_NO, PPERSON.PUSER_NAME as LEADER_K_NAME, PUSER.POS_USERNAME as LEADER_E_NAME, PROLE.PROLE_NAME AS TC_GRP_ROLE_NAME FROM INFODBA.PPOM_GROUP, INFODBA.PGROUP, INFODBA.PPOM_MEMBER, INFODBA.PUSER, INFODBA.PPERSON, INFODBA.PPOM_USER, INFODBA.PGROUPMEMBER, INFODBA.PROLE WHERE PPOM_GROUP.PUID = PGROUP.PUID AND PPOM_MEMBER.RGROUPU = PGROUP.PUID AND PPOM_MEMBER.RUSERU = PUSER.PUID AND PUSER.RPERSONU = PPERSON.PUID AND PPOM_USER.PUID = PUSER.PUID AND PPOM_MEMBER.PUID = PGROUPMEMBER.PUID AND PGROUPMEMBER.RROLEU = PROLE.PUID AND PROLE.PROLE_NAME='TEAM_LEADER' AND PPOM_USER.PSTATUS=0 AND PGROUPMEMBER.PSTATUS=0 ) TC_TEAM WHERE VNET_TEAM.TEAM_CODE=TC_TEAM.TEAM_CODE
SELECT DISTINCT TMCOD AS TEAM_CODE, TEAM AS TEAM_NAME, TEAM_E AS TEAM_E_NAME FROM if_user.SYSA01TB WHERE TMCOD=#{team_code}
